update bal_batch_result_statistic set batch_id = #{batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bal_date = #{balDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_date = #{workDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_owner = #{dataOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trans_status = #{transStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trans_type = #{transType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trans_currency = #{transCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_count = #{totalCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_amt = #{totalAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bal_equal_count = #{balEqualCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bal_equal_amt = #{balEqualAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bal_doubt_count = #{balDoubtCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bal_doubt_amt = #{balDoubtAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bal_error_count = #{balErrorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bal_error_amt = #{balErrorAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, self_doubt_count = #{selfDoubtCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, self_doubt_amt = #{selfDoubtAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, inst_datetime = #{instDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_datetime = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where statistic_id = #{statisticId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select T.statistic_id, T.batch_id, T.bal_date, T.work_date, T.file_id, T.channel_id, T.data_owner, T.trans_status,
T.trans_currency, T.total_count, T.total_amt, T.bal_equal_count, T.bal_equal_amt, T.bal_doubt_count, T.bal_doubt_amt, T.bal_error_count, T.bal_error_amt, T.self_doubt_count, T.self_doubt_amt, T.inst_datetime,
T.memo, T.update_datetime, C.channel_Name, e.type_name status, case t.trans_type when 'GUANGDONG_MOBILE' then d.type_name when 'GUANGDONG_TELECOM' then d.type_name when 'GUANGDONG_UNICOM' then d.type_name else t.trans_type end trans_type from bal_batch_result_statistic T left join base_channel C on T.channel_id=C.channel_id left join base_type D on t.trans_type = d.type_code left join base_type E on t.status = e.type_code
AND #{workDateMax, jdbcType=VARCHAR} >= T.WORK_DATE AND T.WORK_DATE >= #{workDateMin, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.STATUS = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY T.work_date DESC
